thread.title: Guitar Challenge: Can You Guess These 5 Iconic Riffs Based On Just 1 Note? [News]
thread.title_full: Guitar Challenge: Can You Guess These 5 Iconic Riffs Based On Just 1 Note? [News]

title: Guitar Challenge: Can You Guess These 5 Iconic Riffs Based On Just 1 Note? [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 10 hours ago 6 
Guitar instructor Robert Baker presented a fun little guitar challenge, inviting you to guess 5 iconic riffs based on just one note. 
The way the whole thing works is that you can see Robert playing the entire riff, but the sound gets muted as soon as he hits the first note. 
Check it out below, maybe even let us know what your score is if you're up for it.
